hadiths.text: Narrated `Abbad bin Tamim:My uncle asked Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) about a person who imagined to have passed wind during the prayer. Allah' Apostle replied: "He should not leave his prayers unless he hears sound or smells something

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يَتَوَضَّأُ مِنَ الشَّكِّ حَتَّى يَسْتَيْقِنَ
chapter.eng-name: One should not repeat ablution if in doubt unless and until he is convinced (that he has lost his ablution by having Hadath)
